channel.title: Node.js on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: The Realtime Web: Intro To Node.js
item.description: Node.js is a rapidly growing technology that has been making big waves in the world of web development. Node lets you easily build fast and scalable network applications perfect for the realtime web. In this workshop you’ll learn how to get started using Node, its background and history, and the problems it seeks to address. We’ll get our hands dirty building a realtime chat server to get a feel for the amazing power of Node.
